name: British Immigrants Living in Luxembourg
goal: BRILL was established in July 2016 following the UK EU referendum vote. It has approximately 1100 British nationals as members living and/or working in Luxembourg. Our objective is to secure and maintain our existing rights as EU citizens following Brexit, as well as those of EU 27 nationals living in the UK
interests: General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Brexit
Article 50 withdrawal agreement negotiations
EU citizenship rights
Discussions on Brexit and the implementation of any withdrawal agreement in the UK and Luxembourg
